    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Defines the contract for the Tetris game board logic.
    BoardMemento
    Represents a snapshot of the game state at a specific point in time.
    BoardMementoTest
     
    Brick
    Defines the contract for all Tetris game pieces (Tetrominoes).
    BrickGenerator
    Defines the contract for a mechanism that produces Brick objects.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of the active Brick.
    BrickRotatorTest
     
    BrickRotatorTest.TestBrick
     
    ClearRow
    An immutable data carrier that represents the result of a row-clearing operation.
    ColorManager
    Manages the color palette for the game elements.
    EffectManager
    Manages visual special effects for the game board.
    EventSource
    Identifies the origin of a game input event.
    EventType
    Enumerates the specific types of gameplay actions available in the system.
    GameConfiguration
    The centralized configuration registry for the entire application.
    GameController
    The central controller for the Tetris game logic.
    GameHistory
    Manages the history of game states to support the "Undo" feature.
    GameHistoryTest
     
    GameLoopManager
    Manages the core game loop and timing mechanics.
    GameMode
    Defines the contract for different game strategies (modes) within the application.
    GameObserver
    Defines the contract for components that wish to listen to game events.
    GameRenderer
    Handles the graphical rendering of the game state onto the JavaFX scene.
    GuiController
    The main GUI controller for the Tetris game.
    IBrick
    Represents the 'I' Tetris piece (the long straight bar).
    InputEventListener
    Defines the contract for handling user inputs and game state triggers.
    JBrick
    Represents the 'J' Tetris piece (resembling a J shape).
    KeyManager
    Manages keyboard input handling for the application.
    LBrick
    Represents the 'L' Tetris piece (L-shaped tetromino).
    Main
    The entry point for the TetrisJFX application.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MatrixOperations
    A stateless utility class providing core matrix manipulation algorithms for the game.
    MatrixOperationsTest
     
    MoveEvent
    An immutable data transfer object (DTO) representing a specific game movement event.
    NextShapeInfo
    An immutable data object representing the potential next state of a brick rotation.
    NormalMode
    Implements the standard, competitive rules for the Tetris game.
    NotificationPanel
    A custom UI component representing a temporary, floating notification.
    OBrick
    Represents the 'O' Tetris piece (the Square).
    RandomBrickGenerator
    A concrete implementation of BrickGenerator that provides a fair sequence of pieces.
    RandomBrickGeneratorTest
     
    SBrick
    Represents the 'S' Tetris piece (often called the "Snake" or "Skew").
    Score
    Encapsulates the game score using JavaFX properties to support data binding.
    ScoreFileHandler
    Handles the persistence of high score data to the local file system.
    ScoreManager
    Manages the player's current score, level progression, and high score tracking.
    ScoreManagerTest
     
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete implementation of the Board interface representing the standard Tetris grid.
    SimpleBoardTest
     
    SoundManager
    Manages the audio subsystem, handling background music playback and sound effects.
    TBrick
    Represents the 'T' Tetris piece (T-shaped tetromino).
    ViewData
    An immutable Data Transfer Object (DTO) containing a snapshot of the board's dynamic state.
    ZBrick
    Represents the 'Z' Tetris piece (Z-shaped tetromino).
    ZenMode
    Implements the "Zen" ruleset for a relaxed, infinite gameplay experience.
